name: cutcopypastedelete
description: Adds "Delete" to the editor's right click context menu

cutCopyPasteDelete.deleteWordUnderTheCar.description: When enabled deletes word under the caret
When enabled deletes the whole line instead of the word when the caret is at the last character of the current line. REQUIRES "Delete Word Under The Caret" to be enabled

cutCopyPasteDelete.deleteLineIfNoSeletio.description: When enabled deletes line if no text is selected. "Delete Word Under The Caret" takes precedence over this setting, if enabled it will delete the word instead of the line when caret is pointed at the word
When enabled empties the line instead of deleting it. REQUIRES "Delete Line If No Seletion" to be enabled

cutCopyPasteDelete.trim.left.enabled.description: When enabled trims whitespace to the left of deleted text

cutCopyPasteDelete.trim.left.leaveOneSpa.description: When enabled leaves one whitespace to the left of deleted text. REQUIRES Left Trim to be enabled

cutCopyPasteDelete.trim.right.enabled.description: When enabled trims whitespace to the right of deleted text

cutCopyPasteDelete.trim.right.leaveOneSp.description: When enabled leaves one whitespace to the right of deleted text. REQUIRES Right Trim to be enabled
